title: Open-Redirect Lockdown
description:
Users got phished via an unsafe redirect param.

Objective: Secure redirect parameters by whitelisting allowed domains and testing for open-redirects.
dialogue: Mira: "Someone used an open redirect to send users to a phishing site!"
Mira: "Can you help me secure the redirect parameters and test for open-redirects?"
hints: Manipulate the redirect URL to point elsewhere.
